exercises.explanation: Akkusativ masculine uses 'den' for the definite article.

exercises.question: Complete: Das ist _____ nette Frau. (Nominativ, feminine)
exercises.explanation: Nominativ feminine uses 'die' as the definite article.

exercises.question: Complete: Ich gebe _____ alten Mann das Buch. (Dativ, masculine)
exercises.explanation: Dativ masculine uses 'dem' for the definite article.

flashcards.explanation: After definite article 'der', adjectives take -e ending in nominativ.
After indefinite article 'ein', adjectives take -er ending in nominativ masculine.
